gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `NegativeGoodwill` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `NegativeGoodwill` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `NegativeGoodwillMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_NegativeGoodwillEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_NegativeGoodwillEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_NegativeGoodwillStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_NegativeGoodwillStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_NegativeGoodwillMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_NegativeGoodwillMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NegativeGoodwillMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_NegativeGoodwillMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_NegativeGoodwillMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfNegativeGoodwillMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfNegativeGoodwillMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfNegativeGoodwillMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfNegativeGoodwillMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NegativeGoodwill` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_NegativeGoodwill')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_NegativeGoodwill return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfNegativeGoodwillCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfNegativeGoodwillCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfNegativeGoodwillDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfNegativeGoodwillDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NegativeGoodwill` gerapporteerd met `NegativeGoodwillAxis` en `NegativeGoodwillMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `NegativeGoodwill` zonder `NegativeGoodwillAxis` en `NegativeGoodwillMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02NegativeGoodwillAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02NegativeGoodwillAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01NegativeGoodwillAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesNegativeGoodwillMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01NegativeGoodwillAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
